---
title: Performance Visualizations for the `bbob-mixint` test suite 
---

Below, we provide postprocessed data showing the performance of [all currently available algorithm data sets](../../../../testsuites/bbob-mixint/data-archive.html) for the `bbob-mixint` test suite.


## Performance Comparison

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import re
import sys
sys.path.insert(1, '../../scripts/')
from IPython.display import Markdown

import cocopp

dd = cocopp.archiving.get('bbob-mixint')
display(Markdown("\n- [all](https://numbbo.github.io/ppdata-archive/bbob-mixint/all/index.html):"))
for ddd in dd:
	display(Markdown(re.search(r'/([^._]+)[._]', ddd)[0][1:-1] + ", "))

```



## Example code to produce the figures

The Python code to locally generate the above linked data reads

```python
import cocopp                # see https://pypi.org/project/cocopp
cocopp.main('bbob-mixint/*') # will take several minutes to process

```
